templates.title: qBittorrent VPN
templates.description: A powerful and feature-rich BitTorrent client with integrated VPN support using WireGuard for secure and private torrenting.
templates.note: Requires WireGuard VPN configuration. The torrent volume must exist before deployment. Default credentials: admin/adminadmin (change immediately after first login).

env.name: WEBUI_PORT
env.label: Web UI Port
env.description: Port for accessing qBittorrent web interface

env.name: PUID
env.label: User ID (PUID)
env.description: User ID for file permissions (run 'id' command to find yours)

env.name: PGID
env.label: Group ID (PGID)
env.description: Group ID for file permissions (run 'id' command to find yours)

env.name: CONFIG_PATH
env.label: Configuration Path
env.description: Host path for qBittorrent configuration files

env.name: WATCH_FOLDER
env.label: Watch Folder Path
env.description: Host path for torrent watch folder

env.name: WG_PRIVATE_KEY
env.label: WireGuard Private Key
env.description: Your WireGuard private key (keep this secure!)

env.name: WG_PRESHARED_KEY
env.label: WireGuard Preshared Key
env.description: Your WireGuard preshared key (optional but recommended for security)
